name: Survive the Sea (David Mills - Game Developer!)
name_original: Survive the Sea (David Mills - Game Developer!)
description:
Shipwrecked, scared...and hunted.

Play as a dolphin and defend the unfortunate survivors of an accident on the high seas. Without your aid, the survivors will surely die of exposure, hunger, or worse; gruesome shark attacks that could strike at any moment.

Use your abilities as a dolphin to swiftly navigate the treacherous seascape, protecting the survivors, gathering supplies procured from the depths and battling off sharks that would make a meal out of those who float helplessly at the surface.

The ocean is an unforgiving and horrific place, how will YOU survive?

FEATURES:

-Survive as a dolphin in the ocean, hunting fish to refill your hunger meter, or give the fish to survivors to extend their lives while waiting for rescue!

- Interact with other creatures of the deep!

- Aid the survivors by bringing them objects found in the depths so they can craft NEW objects to help them survive!

- Use weapons created by the survivors to augment your attacks when defending against sharks!

- Bring the survivors GLASS SHARDS recovered from the depths to reflect light towards passing ships in order to RESCUE THE SURVIVORS!

- Dolphin abilities such as echolocation and combat dodges help guide you through the game!

- Explore the seafloor for hidden items that may better help you to survive!

- Gamepad and Keyboard compatible!

- Survive through 3 difficulty modes for the ultimate challenge!
